actions.text: Referred to Joint Committee on Atomic Energy.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Atomic Energy Commission to enter into a cooperative agreement with the State of Utah to contain and render harmless uranium mill tailings.

summary.text: Authorizes the Atomic Energy Commission to enter into a cooperative agreement with the State of Utah to contain and render harmless uranium mill tailings.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Atomic Energy Commission to enter into a cooperative agreement with the State of Utah to contain and render harmless uranium mill tailings.
